body:
> How do I create and use testing (mock?) packages? Just another thing that should be documented in the Developer Guide... sigh


I believe there are testing-oriented packages in the test repo.

I also have a "bundle" package (env-modele-ks) in efischer/develop on my fork (github/citibeth/spack).  It's pretty fast to install.
title: Document how to create mock packages for unit tests
